CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.agency_attribute AS SELECT ra.id, r.name AS agency, a.name AS attribute, ra.numeric_value, ra.integer_value, ra.boolean_value, ra.text_value, u.name AS unit, ra.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ra.update_date FROM ruleform.agency_attribute ra JOIN ruleform.agency r ON ra.agency = r.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON ra.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.unit u ON ra.unit = u.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON ra.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.agency_attribute OWNER TO core;
